#summary How folders map to directories on the server

= Introduction =

The Folder panel display a mapping of the directories stored on the server. What can be seen depends in the user's SecurityModel.

= Details =

The folders and recordings are stored in below a directory called _recordings_. 



|| *Folder* || *Directory* || *Security Model* ||
|| Home || recordings/home/username/ || Admin/Writer ||
|| Root || recordings/ || All ||
|| Root/home || recordings/home/ || Admin ||
